detail: It provides real-time weather updates based on user location input. Integrated third-party APIs to display accurate weather data and forecasts, enhancing user experience and engagement.
Artify is a web platform where users can explore and favorite various categories of art. Offers a dynamic and visually rich interface with real-time access to diverse art collections.
This is a responsive feedback form application designed to collect user input and opinions. Ensures accessibility across various devices, improving overall user experience.
Developed an interactive web application designed to assist users in managing their diabetes by providing personalized advice. Empowers users to take control of their diabetes.
Tech_Stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NextJs, Tailwind CSS
